from each regional emission (Fig. 3a). We calculate the ERF as the

Patterns of surface air temperature response to identical aerosol emissions from eight regions. Spatial patterns of surface air temperature change in
response to identical aerosol emission in each the eight regions are shown. Global mean temperature change (K) with standard error is shown in bottom
